THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY1S OOJBfltNMENT).ig C R E T. tP.4175. .CABINET. gCANADIAN CATTLE EMBARGO.PARAPHRASE TELEGRAM FROM THE SECRETARY OP STATE FOR THE COLONIES TO THE GOVERNOR GENERAL OF CANADA. (Sent 2,20 p.rru, 31st August 1922),(Circulated by the Secretary of State for the Colonies)Please communicate following message to your Prime Ministers begins - Many thanks for your telegram of 21st August. The suggestion that the proposed discussions &nthe question of Canadian Cattle should be limited to Ministers and Officials Is acceptable to us and on hearingfrom you what date would be suitable we will arrange for meetings accordingly. If it would be convenient to theCanadian Representatives we should prefer September 26thfor first meeting. Please reply by telegraph ends.CHURCHILL.Ii Whitehall Gardens. S.W., 4th September, 1922,
